title: Studies of normal and impaired hearing and development and evaluation of signal processing hearing aids
abstractText: Prof. Moore is part of the group of people listed by the University under Media Resources. He is frequently consulted by newspaper, radio and TV journalists. He is also listed by the Royal Society as a Fellow available for consultation by the media in matters connected with hearing and hearing impairment. He plans to make presentations at meetings designed for education of the public organised by Defeating Deafness and by RNID.
